meanings.definition: Represented or symbolized by an emblem.
meanings.sent1: The emblematized shield displayed the family crest.
meanings.sent2: The emblematized flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The emblematized trophy wore a tiny crown on its head.
meanings.sent4: Her emblematized necklace was a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The emblematized badge gleamed with honor.

meanings.definition: To symbolize or represent something with an emblem.
meanings.sent1: She emblematized her loyalty by wearing a pin.
meanings.sent2: The team emblematized unity with matching jerseys.
meanings.sent3: He emblematized his love for music by tattooing a note.
meanings.sent4: The painting emblematized peace with a dove.
meanings.sent5: The sculpture emblematized strength with a raised fist.
